ProductInfo.Features:
10000mAh of capacity. Universal charges, compatible with almost all smart phones,  MP3s, GPS, game consoles and tablet PCs, especially for iPhone.
Fast charge, up to 85% high conversion rate. Grade-A Lithium-Polymer core and advanced buck charge program more effective to  reduce energy consumption. Only two hours to charge iphone full.
Dual USB ports: 5V/1A and 5V/2A, charging two devices together with a total of 3A.
A lightweight, unassuming solution to life's daily power needs (0.59 inches thick). LEDs display just how much juice you've got left. Reliable lithium polymer core ensures quality, supplying you with more than 500 charge cycles during the course of its life.
High safety with charge protection: over current, over charge,  over discharge, overheating and short circuit protection.Fabrication Process. Hard-wearing UV adopted to the surface for wear-resisting permanently.
ProductInfo.Name: amzdeal gimall q5 10000mAh Dual-Port Portable High Capacity External Battery Charger Backup Power Bank Universal Charges for iPhone 5S, 5C, 5, 4S, iPad Air, iPads, Samsung Galaxy S4, S3, S2, Note 3, 2, HTC One, EVO, Thunderbolt, Incredible, Droid DNA, Droid, Moto X, Google Glass, Nexus 4 / 7 / 10, LG Optimus, PS Vita, Nook HD+ (Apple / Nook Adapters and Samsung 30-pin Adapter Not Included) (Black)
